title: Sponge cake
description: Italian sponge cake is a light and airy treat crafted from just three ingredients: room temperature eggs, granulated sugar, and low-protein flour for a perfect texture.

title: Chocolate cake
description: The recipe combines dark chocolate, almond meal, eggs, and butter together for a dense, chocolatey slice that pairs well with mascarpone, cream.

title: Opera cake
description: Opera cake is a traditional French dessert with three layers: almond sponge, espresso buttercream, and chocolate ganache.

title: Fruit cream cake
description: bakery-style cake recipe utilizes a soft sponge layer, custard filling, and whipped topping stabilized with gelatin for a soft dessert experience.

title: Black Forest cake
description: Black Forest cake is made by soaking the chocolate sponge in sugar syrup flavored with cherry brandy and topped with whipped cream.

title: Apple cake
description: This simple cinnamon sugar apple cake is light and fluffy, loaded with fresh apples, and topped with a crunchy cinnamon sugar layer.

title: Cupcakes
description: Cupcakes in general come in almost every flavor as traditional cakes, so you can customize the flavours batch to your liking.

title: Micket Mouse cake
description: This birthday cake is a fun and vibrant dessert designed to celebrate birthdays, especially for young fans of the iconic Disney character.

title: Carrot cake
description: Carrot cake can be filled with a variety of fruits, nuts, and flavors.itâ€™s a harmonious blend of flavors that evoke the warmth of home cooking.

title: Rainbow cake
description: Rainbow cake is as magical as it sounds. It has layers, and each one is a different color of the rainbow with different flavours

title: Red velvet cake
description: This cake marries the richness of cocoa with a slight tang from buttermilk and vinegar, creating a taste that is as complex as its appearance.

title: Cheesecake
description: Cheesecake contains cream cheese, sour cream, melted semi-sweet chips, and a pre-made graham cracker crust with strawberries.
